channel.title: Logs on GenCloth
channel.description: Recent content in Logs on GenCloth

item.title: Workshop
item.description: You are invited to a 3 day workshop on digital technologies for the future of fashion design. Advanced digital technologies allow us to rethink the process of traditional fashion design and pattern drafting. Are you interested in envisioning how we will design and consume fashion in 2030? Weâ€™d like designers to spend some time with our digital tools, create body scans and design in 3D, discussing digital design processes and the future of fashion.
